newsitem.title: UK: UK car production up 6.0% in 3mths to July.
newsitem.headline: UK car production up 6.0% in 3mths to July.

text.p: UK total car production rose by a seasonally adjusted 6.0 percent in the three months ending July 1996, compared with the previous three months, the Office for National Statistics said on Friday.
Production allocated for export rose by 11.5 percent and home production increased by 0.6 percent.
Total car production was up a seasonally adjusted 8.0 percent from the same period a year ago with export production up 20.4 percent but home production down 3.1 percent.
